sentences:
Sentence 0:
The specific activity of HMG-CoA reductase in the jejunum was 0.86 nmol/mg per hr, and evenly distributed between crypt and villous cells.
sentence_raw: The specific activity of HMG-CoA reductase in the jejunum was 0.86 nmol/mg per hr, and evenly distributed between crypt and villous cells.
